description: Try our easy to follow Smokey Chipotle Chicken Burrito recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burrito,Microwave,Tree nut free,Rice,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Smokey Chipotle Chicken Burrito Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 One Night in Mexico Tortilla with Corn 10pk
12g One Night in Mexico Smokey Chipotle Seasoning 35g
80ml One Night in Mexico Smokey Chipotle Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sliced chicken and seasoning in a bowl and mix until well coated.
Heat oil in fry pan, then add chicken stirring occasionally until fully cooked, then set aside.
Take sliced pineapple and cook for about 5 minutes each side or until slightly charred.
Open tortilla pouch and heat in microwave on moderate heat for 35 seconds.
Place 1/4 cup of rice in the centre of the tortilla, then top with chicken, black beans, coriander and pineapple.
Drizzle your Smokey Chipotle Sauce at the end for the perfect finish.
Fold up the bottom of the tortilla, then the edges and roll up tightly.
